We transform novices into mid-weight product/UX designers

Introduction

Who can benefit from this bootcamp?

  • Career changers

    For those seeking a career change, explore the realm of UX/UI design â€“ a profession that harmonies creative expression with analytical thinking.

  • Early career professionals

    For recent graduates and early-career professionals aspiring to improve skills and progress to mid-weight UX/UI roles, we provide the essential expertise to excel in the field.

  • Tech novices

    Individuals who have a limited background in technology or design and are interested in acquiring digital design skills to excel as mid-weight designers.

  • Web and graphic designers

    Organise and consolidate your knowledge, enrich your portfolio with diverse projects, and cultivate a heightened sense of confidence within the competitive market landscape.

How it works

Proven method for achieving student excellence: our approach in action

Immerse yourself in hands-on learning guided by personalised mentorship, and actively engage in real-world industry projects to acquire a wealth of expertise. These experiences will skillfully provide you with practical and essential skills, enabling your success in the dynamic design field.

  • Get matched with an industry mentor
    • Weekly live video consultations
    • Comprehensive feedback and reviews
    • Industry insights and tips
  • Career coaching to align with the industry demands
    • Career support from the first day
    • Industry and salary insights
    • LinkedIn and resume writing support
